page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Sample surveys showed that children like playing with friends on recreation grounds and open spaces,using bicycles and playing sports.Watching television was a very popular pastime,films,and "Soap-operas" being the favourite programmes for children,adults also liked news features.Popular adult hobbies were knitting,sewing and reading for women,DIY and gardening for men.Much spare time was spent on music and shopping.Over half said they watched or played sport. Activities provided a change from everyday life a means of exercise and a chance to develop friendships.Unemployed people said their activities helped to pass the time.Many people used Duxbury park and the recreation ground for walks. British Leyland have a sports and social club and there is the town foot- ball club in this block.
